resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103645</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103645</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206618</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Charters of Freedom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Charters der Freiheit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chartes de la liberté</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cartas patentes da liberdade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lettere di libertà</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χάρτες της ελευθερίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cartas de la libertad</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">features primary documents that shaped U.S. history. See images of the Declaration of Independence, Constitution, and Bill of Rights. Learn about the Articles of Confederation, Constitutional Convention, Marbury v. Madison, Louisiana Purchase, slavery, Civil War, 13th Amendment, immigration, and woman suffrage.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kennzeichnet Primärdokumente, die VEREINIGTE 
STAATEN Geschichte formten. Sehen Sie Bilder der 
Unabhängigkeitserklärung, Beschaffenheit und Verfassung. 
Erlernen Sie über die Artikel des Bündnisses, der 
konstitutionellen Versammlung, des Marbury V. Madison, des Louisiana 
Erwerbes, der Sklaverei, des Bürgerkrieges, der 13. Änderung, der 
Immigration und des Fraustimmrechts.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">comporte les documents primaires qui ont formé 
l'histoire des ETATS-UNIS. Voir les images de la déclaration de
l'indépendance, de la constitution, et de la déclaration des droits.
Renseignez-vous sur les articles de la confédération, de la 
convention constitutionnelle, du Marbury v. Madison, de l'achat de la 
Louisiane, de l'esclavage, de la guerre civile, du 13ème amendement, 
de l'immigration, et du suffrage de femme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">caracteriza os originais preliminares que deram 
forma ao history de ESTADOS UNIDOS. Veja imagens da declaração
de independência, de constitution, e de conta de direitas. 
Aprenda sobre os artigos do confederation, da convenção 
constitutional, do Marbury v. Madison, da compra de Louisiana, do 
slavery, da guerra civil, da 1á emenda, do immigration, e do suffrage
da mulher.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">caratterizza i documenti primari che hanno 
modellato la storia degli STATI UNITI. Veda le immagini della 
dichiarazione di indipendenza, della costituzione e della fattura dei 
diritti. Impari circa gli articoli di confederazione, della 
convenzione costituzionale, di Marbury v. Madison, dell'acquisto della
Luisiana, dello slavery, della guerra civile, della tredicesima 
correzione, dell'immigrazione e del suffrage della donna.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χαρακτηρίζει τα αρχικά έγγραφα που διαμόρφωσαν την 
ΑΜΕΡΙΚΑΝΙΚΗ ιστορία. Δείτε τις εικόνες της 
Διακήρυξης της ανεξαρτησίας, του συντάγματος, και Bill των 
δικαιωμάτων. Μάθετε για τα άρθρα της συνομοσπονδίας, της 
συνταγματικής Συνθήκης, Marbury V. Μάντισον, της αγοράς της 
Λουιζιάνας, της σκλαβιάς, του εμφύλιου πολέμου, της 13$ης 
τροποποίησης, της μετανάστευσης, και της ψήφου γυναικών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ofrece los documentos primarios que formaron la 
historia de ESTADOS UNIDOS. Vea las imágenes del declaración 
de la independencia, de la constitución, y de la cuenta de las 
derechas. Aprenda sobre los artículos de la confederación, de 
la convención constitucional, de Marbury v. Madison, de la compra de 
Luisiana, de la esclavitud, de la guerra civil, de la décimotercero 
enmienda, de la inmigración, y del sufragio de la mujer.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206618</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103645</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/charters-of-freedom</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
